description.@en: Within a whorl of ice and snow, your form grows to such immensity that it is no longer yours. Your body transmutates into a living thing of frozen terror!

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, both you and all the trappings upon yourself take the shape of an avatar of the Witch-Queen. Temporarily replace your Character sheet with the creature profile of a Fomori Crone, gaining its benefits and drawbacks. If you suffer an Injury during this time, the Magick spell immediately ends.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but triple the Duration.

criticalFailure.@en: Your half-frozen form temporarily explodes into a bizarre amalgam of fleshy whips and monster: your head turns to the shape of a gaping maw, your teats turn into child-like hands and your legs into prehensile, purple tails. Those who behold your countenance must succeed at a Resolve Test or else they suffer from Terror. In addition, you must succeed at a Toughness Test or else be immediately Slain! (unless you have a Fate Point to expend). If you succeed, you return to your normal self, but are left Prone and Incapacitated!

reagents.@en: A wand made from the humerus of a Fomori Crone, held aloft
